content: Is there an up-to-date list of formalization projects? https://github.com/leanprover-contrib/leanprover-contrib seems outdated, but I would like such a list to have a fully complete list of wanted proofs (https://tristan-f-r.github.io/unsolved-lean/) (I like this list as it gives a good scale to the number of projects that want contributors, but it's also just a fun statistic!)
https://reservoir.lean-lang.org/ is supposed to be the answer
Tristan Figueroa-Reid has marked this topic as resolved.
@Tristan Figueroa-Reid also take a look at SorryDB.
Found it - interesting! Thanks for the notice!
